snippet: The Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court has approved a new order for collection of bulk data on phone calls in the United States.
abstract: Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court approves new order for collection of bulk data on phone calls in the United States; move allows National Security Agency to continue a practice that has been criticized by some members of Congress and the public.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court has approved a new order for collection of bulk data on phone calls in the United States.

headline.main: Surveillance Court Renews Order for Phone Call Data
headline.print_headline: Surveillance Court Renews Order For Phone Call Data
